com.justai.zenbox.sdk.listener

Interface ZenboxListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSkill

    public interface ZenboxListener
    The ZenboxListener interface provides methods for managing the lifecycle of ZenboxService. This is a main interface containing the minimal methods set of lifecycle managing of ZenboxService internal status changing and request processing. If you need more control over the speech-to-text, text-to-speech or voice trigger processes, you should add your listeners to SpeechToText, TextToSpeech and VoiceTrigger instances during the ZenboxService building. All methods except onTriggered() )} and onRequest(RequestData) will be invoked by ZenboxService on the main thread of your application.
    See Also:
    ZenboxService, State, RequestData, ResponseData

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRequest(RequestData data)
      Called when ZenboxService is going to process a recognised user's request.
      void onResponse(ResponseData response)
      Called when ZenboxService has received a response and has already synthesised the speech in the case of success response.
      void onStateChanged(State state)
      Called when ZenboxService has changed it's internal state.
      void onTriggered()
      Called when ZenboxService is going to listen the user's speech.

    • Method Detail

      • onTriggered

        void onTriggered()
        Called when ZenboxService is going to listen the user's speech. This method will be called on the background thread.

      • onStateChanged

        void onStateChanged(State state)
        Called when ZenboxService has changed it's internal state. This method will be called on the main thread.
        Parameters:
        state - the current ZenboxService state
        See Also:
        State

      • onRequest

        void onRequest(RequestData data)
        Called when ZenboxService is going to process a recognised user's request. You can fulfill the request with additional data depending on the list of currently enabled skills of your project (like current timestamp, latitude and longitude and etc.). This method will be called on the background thread.
        Parameters:
        data - the request data.
        See Also:
        RequestData

      • onResponse

        void onResponse(ResponseData response)
        Called when ZenboxService has received a response and has already synthesised the speech in the case of success response. This method can be used to dispatch the response data to the appropriate component of your application to process an actions related to the user's intent. This method will be called on the main thread.
        Parameters:
        response - a response data.
        See Also:
        ResponseData
